1. use strong and unique passwords for each account.

4. use two-factor authentication wherever possible.
5. regularly check your privacy settings on social media and adjust them as needed.
6. use encryption tools to protect your data when transferring it over the internet.
7. monitor your credit report regularly for any suspicious activity or errors.
8. be careful about clicking on links in emails or messages that may be phishing attempts.
